form.startDateTooltip: Date when discount starts being valid
form.endDateTooltip: Date when discount stops being valid
form.appointmentStartDateTooltip: The earliest appointment date (inclusive) for which this discount can be applied. Appointments scheduled before this date will not be eligible for the discount.
form.appointmentEndDateTooltip: The latest appointment date (inclusive) for which this discount can be applied. Appointments scheduled after this date will not be eligible for the discount.
form.maxUsageTooltip: The total number of times this discount can be used across all customers. Once this limit is reached, the discount will no longer be available.
form.maxUsagePerCustomerTooltip: The maximum number of times an individual customer can use this discount. Further attempts to use the discount by that customer will be rejected after this limit is reached.
form.limitToTooltip: Restrict discount to specific options and add-ons
form.removeLimitDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this limit?

main.scheduleProviderAppTooltip1: Select optional app to provide your work schedule.
main.scheduleProviderAppTooltip2: If no app is selected, base schedule will be applied.
main.autoConfirmTooltip1: Select this option if you want to auto confirm all appointments created by customers.
main.autoConfirmTooltip2: By default, you will need to manually confirm each appointment.
main.showPromoCodeTooltip: Configure should the promo code field be shown during the booking
main.maxWeeksInFuture: Maximum number of weeks into the future
main.maxWeeksInFutureTooltip1: Specifies the maximum number of weeks into the future that a user can schedule appointments.
main.maxWeeksInFutureTooltip2: If set to 6, users can only schedule events up to 6 weeks from the current date.
main.minBreakTimeTooltip1: Defines the minimum required time interval that must be left available before and after a scheduled time slot.
main.minBreakTimeTooltip2: This field ensures there is a buffer period before and after each slot to accommodate breaks, preparation time, or to prevent scheduling conflicts.
main.minBreakTimeTooltip3: If set to 30, there must be at least 30 minutes of free time before and after each scheduled slot before the next slot can begin.
main.minHoursBeforeBooking: Minimum number of hours before booking
main.minHoursBeforeBookingTooltip1: Specifies the minimum number of hours required in advance for a booking to be made. This parameter helps ensure that users cannot book an appointment with less notice than the designated time frame, allowing you to prepare accordingly
main.minHoursBeforeBookingTooltip2: If set to 24, a booking can only be made if it is at least 24 hours before the desired start time.
main.allowedSlotStartTimesTooltip: Defines at which times appointments allowed to start
main.customTimeSlotsTooltip: Defines at which minute appointments allowed to start
main.customTimeSlotsPlaceholder: Click plus button to add time slot

stepLabels.five: Every hour at XX:05, XX:10, XX:15, XX:20, XX:25, XX:30, XX:35, XX:40, XX:45, XX:50, XX:55
stepLabels.ten: Every hour at XX:00, XX:10, XX:20, XX:30, XX:40, XX:50
stepLabels.fifteen: Every hour at XX:00, XX:15, XX:30, XX:45
stepLabels.twenty: Every hour at XX:00, XX:20, XX:40

smartSchedule.enableSmartScheduleTooltip: Enables more sophisticated features for finding time slots and maximizing bookings
smartSchedule.experimentalWarning: Attention! This is highly experimental feature that may cause unexpected behavior during appointment booking.
smartSchedule.allowSkipBreakTooltip: Allows skipping break when no other has been found
smartSchedule.preferBackToBackTooltip: Will give higher preference for time slots, that will allow back-to-back appointments
smartSchedule.allowSmartSlotStartsTooltip: If no allowed slot start times were found, will try to find unconventional time slot
smartSchedule.preferredServiceTooltip: If selected, will prioritize time slots that will produce maximum number of appointments of the selected service

payments.enableDepositsTooltip: Enables ability to ask for a deposit to book an appointment
payments.paymentsAppTooltip: What payment processor to use for payments
payments.requireDepositTooltip1: If enabled, each customer will be required to pay a deposit to book an appointment
payments.requireDepositTooltip2: Can be overriden per each customer
payments.depositAmountTooltip:
Deposit amount in percents

Example: If set to 100, full price will be required to be paid upfront

Optional
payments.dontRequireIfCompletedMinNumberOfAppoint: Min amount of appointments to not require deposit

Do not require deposit for customers who have at least specified amount of appointments completed

Example: If set to 3, customers who are booking their first, second, or third appointment will be required to pay a deposit. While customers who are making their 4th or later appointmens will not be required to pay deposit unless it is specifically required for the customer

Optional
